channel.title: Space manufacturing on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Space manufacturing on FinanClub

item.title: RKLB
item.description: score:38 Chances: Rocket Lab has successfully completed the first space manufacturing mission outside of the International Space Station, indicating their capability in in-space manufacturing and hypersonic reentry logistics. Risks: The heavy reliance on government contracts for their launch services could pose a risk, particularly if there are changes in government priorities or budget allocations.
